description:
Rule the mountain with the Queen Bee all-mountain snowboard that eats powder in the morning and stays composed through afternoon chop. A softer flexing board gives you a playful, forgiving ride with excellent agility and power. 50cm of rocker with early rise in the nose and tail gives it easy turn initiation and amazing float. The directional freeride shape lets you get playful when you're feeling it – to land or ride switch.

  • ABS sidewalls reduce the swing weight for improved manoeuvrability
  • Triaxial fibreglass offers a good balance of flex and torsional control
  • Soft flexing all-mountain design performs in a wide range of conditions
  • Birch core is lightw and snappy
  • Traditional camber underfoot adds to stability and edge hold
  • FSC-certified wood and Entropy resins reduce the environmental impact of manufacturing
  • 50cm rocker in the tip and tail keeps you afloat in soft snow
  • Sintered 7500 base has great wax retention for a fast ride
name: Coalition Snow Queen Bee All Mountain Snowboard - Women's
